Detailed Description

This interface allows the component to get at its own framework-managed properties.

It's a considerable simplification on BuilderService.

Member Function Documentation

gov.cca.TypeMap ccaffeine.ports.ComponentPropertiesService.getProperties (   ) 
 

Returns:
the framework maintained properties of the component.

void ccaffeine.ports.ComponentPropertiesService.mergeProperties (  in gov.cca.TypeMap  tm  ) 
 

Merge in the data from tm to the existing properties for the component.

Attempts to change protected values are silently ignored.

void ccaffeine.ports.ComponentPropertiesService.removeProperties (  in array< string >  keys  ) 
 

Cause the key/value pairs for the list of keys given to be removed from among the component properties.

Attempts to remove protected or undefined properties are ignored.
